info.description: This is the gateway specification for the GoCord project.
info.title: GoCord Gateway

get.description: Get messages for the given channel ID

parameters.description: Limit the number of messages returned
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Get messages around a specific message ID
parameters.name: around

parameters.description: Get messages before a specific message ID
parameters.name: before

parameters.description: Get messages after a specific message ID
parameters.name: after

post.description: Create a message for the given channel ID
Bulk delete messages for the given channel ID

get.description: Get message by id for the given channel ID

delete.description: Delete a message for the given channel ID

patch.description: Edit a message for the given channel ID

put.description: Edit channel permissions for the given channel ID

parameters.description: ID of a user or role to overwrite permissions for
parameters.name: overwrite.id

delete.description: Delete channel permissions for the given channel ID

parameters.description: ID of a user or role to overwrite permissions for
parameters.name: overwrite.id

get.description: Get pinned messages for the given channel ID

put.description: Add a pinned message for the channel associated with the given ID

delete.description: Delete a pinned message for the given channel ID

put.description: Add a recipient to the group DM associated with the given ID

delete.description: Remove a recipient from the group DM associated with the given ID

post.description: Trigger the typing indicator for the given channel ID

get.description: Get users banned from a guild
Get a user banned from a guild

post.description: Ban a user from a guild

delete.description: Remove a user's ban from a guild

get.description: Get a guild's channels by id

patch.description: Modify the current member of a guild

parameters.description: Query string to match username(s) and nickname(s) against
parameters.name: query

get.description: Get a guild member by id

put.description: Add a member to a guild

delete.description: Remove a member from a guild

put.description: Add a role to a member of a guild

delete.description: Remove a role from a member of a guild

post.description: Create a new role for a guild

delete.description: Delete a guild's role by id

patch.description: Modify a guild's role by id

embeds.description: TODO add multipart form data for attachments
